description:
Devoted to helping you obtain the full amount of compensation you deserve following a serious accident or some other act of negligence or wrongdoing that has left you or a loved one seriously injured or worse, the attorneys at Dudley & Lake in Chicago, Illinois, are fully prepared to do whatever we can to improve your chances of obtaining the favorable outcomes you seek for your legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Personal injury
  • Wrongful death
  • Medical malpractice
  • Nursing home abuse
  • Workers' compensation
  • Construction accidents
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Trucking accidents
  • Sexual abuse, assault and filming

Established in 2001 in Libertyville, our law firm's growth lends credence to the level of success we have achieved advocating on behalf of individuals and families across Northern and Central Illinois who are suffering needlessly through no fault of their own. To date, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, including a record-breaking verdict of more than $25 million for the victim of medical malpractice.

Honored for our outstanding professionalism and unwavering commitment to those we serve, our lawyers have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers, and our law firm has enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To begin the process of obtaining justice in the wake of a preventable tragedy that has adversely affected your life, your family and your future, you can contact Dudley & Lake to schedule a free initial consultation concerning your claim. In these uncertain times, we also offer virtual consultations so that you do not have to further risk your health and safety to speak with us.
